name: Planet A18
description:
Welcome to the Planet A18. You have travelled millions of miles to see this beautiful place. Unfortunately some hostile creatures have occupied the planet. Every single one of them wants to kill you... So, let's give them what they deserve! Explore the planet to find the best equipment for the job. Finally, find the evil boss and be sure to give him our best regards from Planet Earth!

Entry for Assembly 2018 Game Dev competition.

Controls:

Left/Right = turn

Up = accelerate

Space = shoot or use item

1, 2, 3, 4, 5 = select weapon or item
